comment.author: 66041448@N00
comment._content: This is a smudge painting (using the smudge brush in Paint Shop Pro and a Wacom tablet) of the Ashuelot River, Keene, NH, based on this image contributed to the Flickr Commons by the Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County. See a larger view at: farm5.static.flickr.com/4007/4703297437_8a94469e88_o.jpg Welcome KPL and HSCC, and thank you for your inspiration!
